TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseGestureConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件來回轉換成其他型別。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會在 的執行個體和 之間來回轉換。The class only converts an instance of to and from a . 將轉換的輔助按鍵和滑鼠動作之間的分隔符號使用的"+"字元。The converts to and from a using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action. 例如，字串`Control+RightClick`會轉換成與屬性等於和屬性等於。For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a with a property equal to and property equal to .
